acadia.text: Is this your first time at Acadia University?
acadia.tip: If you're new, the guide will walk you through arrival, housing, and essentials. If not, you can jump straight to exploring.
Choosing your method of arrival helps us show the most relevant pointers and directions.
You'll see where the shuttle drops off, nearby landmarks, and what to do next.
We’ll outline pickup zones, parking, and the fastest way to reach campus buildings.
You'll get info on stop locations, routes, and walking paths to campus.
Includes drop-off areas, typical fares, and where to enter campus.

acadia.text: Where do you plan on staying for the year?
acadia.tip: This helps us load the correct directions — campus residences or off-campus housing.
You’ll see directions from campus entry points to your selected residence.

residences: 55 University Ave (formerly known as Cutten House)

acadia.text: Do you need a SIM card?
acadia.tip: Choosing ‘Yes’ will show convenient locations nearby for new students.
These locations are popular among students for quick SIM setup.

acadia.text: Where do you want to go next?
